item.description:
We are a social club of people who just happen to be tall. We meet up and do all sorts of fun stuff together, aside from compare notes on "where to buy tall clothing/shoes".... :)
In addition to hosting our local members at events, we also play host to other Tall Club members visiting the New England area.
We host and participate in a wide range of activities, including: Cocktail hour at the Newton Marriott the First Friday of each month at 6pm, Monthly "meet and greet" events at other local pubs, Dancing & more dancing (we hold several dances every year), Wine-tasting (we have a group of "wino's" that attend the Boston Wine Expo every year!), Walking outings, Art exhibitions at the Museum of Fine Arts, and House parties and weekends away throughout New England - note that house parties and weekends are open to BBTC members and their guests; they are not public events.
Please see our official Club Web-site at http://www.hubtall.org/ for more information.
item.name: The Boston Beanstalks Tall Club
